headline.main: Marriage Is Lifesaver For Men After 45

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''MARRIAGE, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil,'' said the Greek comic playwright Menander. Indeed, for middle-aged men, it may be a lifesaver.
